findings.title: Block gas limit (MasterChef)
findings.description: add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue (MasterChef)
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change critical parameters such as fee address, dev address, and EgonPerBlock. Additionally, the minter role can mint.
